text: Luis de Pablo Costales (28 January 1930 – 10 October 2021Muere a los 91 años el compositor Luis de Pablo ) was a Spanish composer. He was part of the movement of Spanish composers named Generación del 51. Pablo died in Madrid on 10 October 2021, aged 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish composers Category:People from Bilbao
title: Luis de Pablo
